short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open & Save Excalidraw files on your Google Drive

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Excalidrive is a handy Chrome extension that makes it super easy to connect Excalidraw, the fun online drawing tool, with your Google Drive. Now you can sketch, diagram, and save your creations effortlessly, all in one place.

What's new in 1.2 
1. Set current drawing into favorites, and it's sync into google drive
2. Introducing Sidebar, where you can see your favorites drawing & recents drawing
3. Auto Save 

What’s Inside:

1. Smooth Integration: Open and save your Excalidraw diagrams directly to Google Drive—no jumping between apps, just pure creativity.
2. Safe & Sound: Uses OAuth 2.0 to keep your Drive access secure, so you can focus on your sketches and diagrams directly from browser (no backend not man in the middle).
3. Feels Just Right: Works right inside Excalidraw, blending in like it’s part of the magic.

How It Works:

Excalidrive slips right into the Excalidraw interface, adding simple options to open from or save directly to Google Drive. With a few quick clicks, your diagrams are stored safely in the cloud, ready whenever you are.

Perfect For:
• Developers who love creating clear, hand-drawn diagrams in Excalidraw
• Artists, thinkers, or anyone who enjoys doodling without worrying about losing their work
• Teams that need a shared, cloud-based home for their sketches and diagrams
• Fans of Excalidraw who want a quick and easy way to back up their creative genius

Take your Excalidraw workflow to the next level with Excalidrive. Keep your sketches and diagrams safe, and never lose a masterpiece again!

⚠️ **IMPORTANT**: This extension is currently in beta. Please back up your Excalidraw files before installing and using Excalidrive.
